To Do List

  • get up
  • make a cofee

1) To create new list, click the input, add text and press Enter

2) To delete the list, click the trash can icon

3) If you want to cross out the list, click on a point in the list

4) To save the changes, click the save icon

5) To delete the entire list, click the eraser icon

6) To hide this message, click the lightbulb icon
